name: WorktreeComment
description: Post an Open workspace link on every new work item
author: worktree-io

inputs.name: token
inputs.label: Access Token
inputs.helpMarkDown: ADO access token used to post the comment. Defaults to the built-in System.AccessToken.

inputs.name: workItemId
inputs.label: Work Item ID
inputs.helpMarkDown: The ID of the work item to comment on. Populated automatically by the service hook trigger.

inputs.name: codeHost
inputs.label: Code Host
inputs.helpMarkDown: The code hosting service for the paired repository.

inputs.name: gitlabOwner
inputs.label: GitLab Owner
inputs.helpMarkDown: The GitLab namespace (user or group) of the paired repository. Required when Code Host is GitLab.

inputs.name: gitlabRepo
inputs.label: GitLab Repository
inputs.helpMarkDown: The GitLab repository name. Required when Code Host is GitLab.
